item.title: RideonJapan announces ‘blackjack RPG’ Brave x Junction for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/rideonjapan-announces-blackjack-rpg-brave-x-junction-for-pc

  • PC

Battle monsters in a back-and-forth contest of blackjack.

RideonJapan has announced Brave x Junction, a new RPG where you battle monsters in a back-and-forth contest of blackjack. It will launch for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced. It will support English and Japanese language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Brave x Junction is an RPG where you battle monsters in a back-and-forth contest of blackjack, the playing card game familiar to many.

Defeat the monsters and delve dungeons. A fun tale of adventure all while being simple to play.

Key Features

  • Blackjack Style Turn-Based Battle System
    • Battles are a one-on-one turn-based system.
    • Who has the closest number to 21 in their hand? They deal an attack to the opponent!
    • Three distinctive playable characters make an appearance: The Fighter, with a head on battle-like creed; the Thief, unrivaled in sensing danger and thwarting it; and the Magician, who employs trickery at will!
    • Leave your strategy to chance? Entrap the enemy with trickery? The way you enjoy is up to you, the player.
  • Diverse Array of Monsters
    • Slimes, orcs, dragons, and monsters, familiar to fantasy RPGs all lurk out of the depths, one after another.
    • Card hand concealing ghosts, trolls that surpass the 21-card value limit, and many more with a diverse array of skills stand in the way of the player.
    • Monsters from Rideon Japan‘s Adventure Bar Story and Mercenaries Saga series games even make an appearance!
  • Loads of Factors to Augment, Unfolding a Blackjack Victory
    • Acquire boost cards as you advance the adventure, strengthening status and learning skills.
    • Abilities come along with some weapons and accessories, and at the Armory & Forge in town, synthesis can allow for unbound customization.
    • Combining skills with abilities? This could bring to life new tactics.
    • Can you traverse the untrodden dungeons? It’s all up to you, the player!

View the first screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers launches July 24
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/wuchang-fallen-feathers-launches-july-24

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Step into a dark fantasy of myth and mystery.

WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Microsoft Store on July 24 for $49.99 / £44.99 / €49.99, publisher 505 Games and developer Leenzee Games announced. It will also be available via Game Pass.

Pre-orders for WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers will include the “Night & White Pack,” which contains the following content:

  • “Night Spectre Enhanced Costume Set” (five costume pieces)
  • “White Spectre Enhanced Costume Set” (five costume pieces)
  • “Vermillion War Club (Axe)”
  • “Glistening Red Mercury Skill Upgrade Item”

A Deluxe Edition will also be available for $59.99 / £49.99 / €59.99, which includes the base game, four costumes (“Tiger of Fortune Costume,” “Draconic Resurgence Costume,” “Soul Ritual Robe Costume,” “Overlord’s Regalia Costume”), four Weapons (“Watcher’s Gaze [Sword],” “Dragoncoil Lance [Spear],” “Eternal Sovereignty [Dual Blades],” “Moonlight Dragon [Sword]”), and the “Blood of Changhong Skill Upgrade Item.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via 505 Games:

WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers is a Soulslike action RPG set in the land of Shu during the dark and tumultuous late Ming Dynasty, plagued with warring factions and a mysterious illness spawning monstrous creatures.

Become Wuchang, a skilled pirate warrior struck by amnesia, who must navigate the uncertainties of her mysterious past while afflicted by the horrific Feathering disease. Explore the depths of Shu, enhancing your arsenal and mastering new skills harvested from fallen foes. Evolve your fighting style by sacrificing elusive Red Mercury and further develop new techniques obtained throughout your action-packed journey. Augment the weapons in your repertoire with powerful enchantments, allowing for a unique approach to combat and strategy that suits your personal style.

Battle against grotesque abominations, drawing on ancient lore to challenge the creeping darkness that threatens the humanity that remains. Your quest for truth will take you through forgotten temples, overgrown ruins, and shadowed paths fraught with peril. As you piece together Wuchang’s lost memories, your choices will lead you to one of several endings—each determined by the choices made, secrets unearthed and the allies you choose to trust.

Immerse yourself in a rich storyline, dynamic combat system, and breathtaking visuals that offer an unforgettable adventure through lands veiled in chaos and death. Will you reveal the truths of Wuchang’s curse and bring peace to Shu, or will you succumb to the encroaching horrors? The fate of the land rests in your hands.
